version_description:
Genshin Impact release date: September 28, 2020
Explore a world of adventure!
Fixed a problem with the app reading the clipboard

NEW CHARACTERS: Tartaglia, Zhongli, Diona, Xinyan
NEW STORY: Archon Quest "A New Star Approaches"
NEW EVENT: Unreconciled Stars
NEW SYSTEMS: City Reputation, Archive, Exploration Progress

- Fixes some known bugs in the game.
- Optimizes stability of the game client.

NEW CHARACTERS: Tartaglia, Zhongli, Diona, Xinyan
NEW STORY: Archon Quest "A New Star Approaches"
NEW EVENT: Unreconciled Stars
NEW SYSTEMS: City Reputation, Archive, Exploration Progress

- Fixes some known bugs in the game.
- Optimizes stability of the game client.
- Adjusted game age rating.

New Characters: Albedo and Ganyu
New Area: Dragonspine
New Event: The Chalk Prince and the Dragon
New Domain: Domain of Blessing - Peak of Vindagnyr
New Artifact Sets: Blizzard Strayer and Heart of Depth

- Fixes some known bugs in the game.
- Optimizes stability of the game client.

New Character: "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao (Anemo)
New Event: Lantern Rite Main Event "All That Glitters"
New Weapons: Primordial Jade Cutter and Staff of Homa
New Quest: Story Quest "Butterfly's Dream"
New Monsters: Geovishaps and Primo Geovishaps will appear in the Liyue region
New Features: Controllers supported for iOS 14 or later

Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume" Has Begun!
New Character: "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria (Cryo)
New Event: The Windblume Festival themed-event "Invitation of Windblume"
New Weapon: Elegy for the End
New Quests: The Archon Quest "We Will Be Reunited" and Hangout Event Story Quests

Version 1.5 "Beneath the Light of Jadeite" has begun!
New Characters: Eula, Yanfei
New System: Serenitea Pot
New Quests: Story Quests "No Mere Stone," "The Spindrift Shall Never Return to the Sea"
New Events: "Energy Amplifier Initiation," "Windtrace," "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon," "Mimi Tomo"
New Weapon: Song of Broken Pines
New Domains: Ridge Watch, Beneath the Dragon-Queller

Version 1.6 "Midsummer Island Adventure" is now available!
New Character: "Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves" Kaedehara Kazuha (Anemo)
New Summer-Themed Event: Midsummer Island Adventure
New System: Updates to the Serenitea Pot and Dressing Room
New Quest: "Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves"
New Weapon: Freedom-Sworn (Sword)
New Monster: Maguu Kenki

Version 2.0 "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia" is now available!
New Characters: Kamisato Ayaka, Yoimiya, and Sayu
New Area: Inazuma
New Event: Inazuma Main Event "Thunder Sojourn"
New Story: New Archon Quests and Story Quests
New Weapons: Thundering Pulse and Mistsplitter Reforged
New Opponents: Pyro Hypostasis and Perpetual Mechanical Array

Genshin Impact - 1 Year Anniversary
New Characters: Raiden Shogun, Sangonomiya Kokomi, Kujou Sara
New Areas: Seirai Island and Watatsumi Island
New Events: "Moonlight Merriment" and "Passage of Clouds and Stars"
New Stories: New Archon Quest and Story Quests
New Weapons: Engulfing Lightning, Everlasting Moonglow, Luxurious Sea-Lord, "The Catch"
New System: Fishing System
New Monsters: Signora, Hydro Hypostasis, Thunder Manifestation, Specters
